0.name: AlphaFold2+MD
0.description: Using AlphaFold2_mmseqs2 to generate protein model + MD simulation using AMBER to generate topology and to build simulation box
0.author: Arantes P.R.

1.name: AMBER
1.description: Using AMBER to generate topology and to build the simulation box
1.author: Arantes P.R.

2.name: CHARMM
2.description: Using inputs from CHARMM-GUI solution builder
2.author: Arantes P.R.

3.name: Protein-Ligand simulations
3.description: Using AMBER to generate topology and to build the simulation box and for the ligand using GAFF2 or OpenFF force fields
3.author: Arantes P.R.

4.name: Using AMBER Inputs
4.description: Using inputs from AMBER suite of biomolecular simulation program
4.author: Arantes P.R.

5.name: Using GROMACS Inputs
5.description: Using inputs from GROMACS biomolecular simulation package (AMBER, CHARMM and OPLS force fields are compatible)
5.author: Arantes P.R.

6.name: Molecular Dynamics using Gromacs
6.description: MD Protein Simulation at 10ns using Gromacs 2021 GPU
6.author: Girinath G Pillai

7.name: RoseTTAFold
7.description: RoseTTAFold: Accurate prediction of protein structures and interactions using a three-track neural network.
7.author: Minkyung et al.

8.name: RoseTTAFold2
8.description: RoseTTAFold: Accurate prediction of protein structures and interactions using a three-track neural network.
8.author: Minkyung et al.

9.name: AlphaFold complexes
9.description: The functionality for complex prediction (including going beyond dimers)
9.author: Minkyung Baek and Yoshitaka Moriwaki

10.name: AlphaFold2 mmseqs2 v1.5.2
10.description: Easy to use protein structure and complex prediction using AlphaFold2 and Alphafold2-multimer.
10.author: Mirdita et al.

11.name: AlphaFold2 mmseqs2 v1.5.5
11.description: Easy to use protein structure and complex prediction using AlphaFold2 and Alphafold2-multimer.
11.author: Mirdita et al.

12.name: AlphaFold2 batch
12.description: Easy to use AlphaFold2 protein structure (Jumper et al. 2021) and complex (Evans et al. 2021) prediction using multiple sequence alignments generated through MMseqs2.
12.author: Mirdita et al.

13.name: AlphaFold2 advanced
13.description: This notebook modifies deepmind's original notebook (before AlphaFold-Multimer existed) to add experimental support for modeling complexes (both homo and hetero-oligomers), option to run MMseqs2 instead of Jackhmmer for MSA generation and advanced functionality.
13.author: Mirdita et al.

14.name: Rapid protein stability prediction
14.description: Rapid protein stability prediction using deep learning representations.
14.author: Blaabjerg et al.

15.name: ESMFold
15.description: ESMFold (Evolutionary Scale Modeling) by Meta AI.
15.author: S. Ovchinnikov

21.name: Seq2Ensemble
21.description: Seq2Ensemble: A collection of Colab notebooks for generating conformational ensembles of proteins from the primary sequences.
21.author: Sedinkin et al.

22.name: XEASY2UCSF
22.description: XEASY2UCSF: Convert XEASY spectrum to UCSF spectrum.
22.author: Woonghee Lee

23.name: SSDraw
23.description: SSDraw is a program that generates publication-quality protein secondary structure diagrams from three-dimensional protein structures.
23.author: NCBI

24.name: OpenFold
24.description: A faithful but trainable PyTorch reproduction of DeepMind's AlphaFold 2.
24.author: AlQuraishi Laboratory

25.name: EvoBind
25.description: EvoBind: in silico directed evolution of peptide binders with AlphaFold.
25.author: Patrick Bryant Laboratory

26.name: PCA with FDA drugs
26.description: Run PCA your molecule with FDA approved drugs.
26.author: Woonghee Lee

27.name: Cfold
27.description: Structure prediction of alternative protein conformations.
27.author: Patrick Bryant

28.name: AF-Cluster
28.description: Predict multiple protein conformations using sequence clustering and AlphaFold2.
28.author: Hannah Wayment-Steele

29.name: BindCraft
29.description: BindCraft: one-shot design of functional protein binders.
29.author: Martin Pacesa

30.name: PDB2VOL simulation
30.description: Electron density map simulation using a PDB file via PDB2VOL from SITUS.
30.author: Woonghee Lee

31.name: NuFold RNA structure prediction
31.description: NuFold is a state-of-the-art method designed for predicting 3D RNA structures, leveraging deep learning for high accuracy and reliability. This tool is particularly useful for biologists and bioinformatics researchers focusing on RNA function and structure.
31.author: Daisuke Kihara

32.name: Biomolecular Emulator (BioEmu)
32.description: BioEmu is a framework for emulating biomolecular dynamics and integrating structural prediction tools to accelerate research in structural biology and protein engineering. This notebook uses BioEmu with ColabFold to generate the MSA and identify cluster conformations using Foldseek.
32.author: Sarah Lewis et al.

33.name: CatPred: DL In Vitro Enzyme Kinetic Parameter Prediction
33.description: CatPred, a deep learning framework for predicting in vitro enzyme kinetic parameters, including turnover numbers (kcat), Michaelis constants (Km), and inhibition constants (Ki).
33.author: Veda Sheersh Boorla and Costas D. Maranas
